IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_equip_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_equip_item GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_equip_item @item_id dbo.id_t, @new_item_code dbo.code_t, @fragment_count TINYINT, @open_socket_count TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION
UPDATE dbo.Inventories SET item_code = @new_item_code WHERE id = @item_id
UPDATE dbo.EquipItemInfos SET open_socket_count = @open_socket_count, fragment_count = @fragment_count WHERE inventory_id = @item_id
COMMIT END TRY BEGIN CATCH ROLLBACK END CATCH
SET NOCOUNT OFF
